name: UltraGoodness
description: Tear your enemies to pieces, leave oceans of blood and mountains of corpses in new dynamic and colorful action designed in pixel art style. All in the name of Goodness, of course!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB, WebGL compatible Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio (recommended)
